---
name: Stakeholder Requirements
about: define the requirements
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

As a user, I need the ability to create a product in the catalog so that I can add new items to the inventory.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** I am a logged-in user
- **When** I access the "Create Product" form
- **Then** I should be able to enter product details and submit the form to add the product to the catalog.


As a user, I need the ability to retrieve a product from the catalog so that I can view details of existing products.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** I am on the catalog page
- **When** I search for or select a product
- **Then** I should see the detailed information of the selected product.

As a user, I need the ability to update a product in the catalog so that I can modify product details as needed.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** I am a logged-in user with edit permissions
- **When** I access the "Edit Product" form
- **Then** I should be able to update product details and save the changes.

As a user, I need the ability to delete a product from the catalog so that I can remove items that are no longer needed.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** I am a logged-in user with delete permissions
- **When** I choose to delete a product
- **Then** the product should be removed from the catalog and no longer appear in searches or listings.

As a user, I need the ability to Like a product in the catalog so that I can express my preference for certain products.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** I am a logged-in user
- **When** I click the "Like" button on a product
- **Then** the product should be marked as liked and this preference should be saved.

As a user, I need the ability to Dislike a product in the catalog so that I can express my disinterest in certain products.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** I am a logged-in user
- **When** I click the "Dislike" button on a product
- **Then** the product should be marked as disliked and this preference should be saved.

As a user, I need the ability to list all products in the catalog so that I can view the complete inventory.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** I am on the catalog page
- **When** I view the product listings
- **Then** I should see all products currently available in the catalog.


As a user, I need the ability to query a subset of products in the catalog so that I can filter and find specific products based on criteria.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** I am on the catalog page
- **When** I apply a filter or search criteria
- **Then** I should see only the products that match the specified criteria.


As a user, I need the system to be hosted in the cloud so that it is accessible from anywhere and scales as needed.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** the deployment environment
- **When** the application is deployed
- **Then** it should be hosted on a cloud platform.


As a user, I need automation to deploy new changes to the cloud so that updates are seamlessly integrated without manual intervention.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- **Given** a new change is committed
- **When** the deployment process is triggered
- **Then** the change should be automatically deployed to the cloud environment.
